dcterms:creator: R. Kabra
C. Burgess
L. Matthey
R. L. Kaufman
K. Greff
M. Reynolds
A. Lerchner
dcterms:description: Multi-dSprites is a dataset designed for multi-object representation learning, containing 1,000,000 images with diverse object arrangements. The images are standardized to pixel values from [-1, 1] and are used to evaluate segmentation performance.
dcterms:title: Multi-dSprites

dcterms:creator: R. Kabra
C. Burgess
L. Matthey
R. L. Kaufman
K. Greff
M. Reynolds
A. Lerchner
dcterms:description: ObjectsRoom is a dataset used for multi-object representation learning, containing 1,000,000 images with various object placements and backgrounds. The dataset is utilized to assess segmentation metrics, focusing on foreground object segmentation.
dcterms:title: ObjectsRoom
